There are a lot of corporations which still use Blackberry phones for day to day usage. It's not something new. However , with the advent of BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) people are able to get their own android or iOS devices which can be configured to get the mailing part or any other useful apps. BB’s are still in business at a corporate level owing to their really good exchange mailing devices popularly called BES. At my workplace, like many other camera mobiles are not allowed and hence I use a Bold 9900 cameraless mobile. And I use Z10 otherwise. I do love these devices as they have a very streamlined and stable OS. The market share may be less but BB’s are still in business.
